Name: SandBird
Notes: A platform consisting of various smaller chunks. The chunks are SandBirdParts objects that have to be linked to this object using GeneratorId. If no path is assigned, the platform won't move at all. If a path is assigned, it will start moving once the player steps on one of the blocks.

Obj_arg0.Name: Default Movement Speed
Obj_arg0.Description: The rate at which it moves on the path. Default is 6.

Point_arg0.Name: Movement Speed
Point_arg0.Description: The rate at which it moves from this point.

Rail.Description: The path that it can move on.

BaseMtxFollowTarget.Description: Can be followed by another BaseMtxFollower object.
